steps.value: Given I am on main application page
When I change window size to `${resolution}`
When I save `content` attribute value of element located `elementName(version):a` to ((story)) variable `ui-version`
When I go to relative URL `/my-cases?search=all`
When I wait until element located by `testId(jnj-create-new-case-button)` appears

scenarios.title: open case details page

steps.value: !-- To add visual checks which cover overall design, BMI flag once case save, NUC-11 is implemented
When I click on element located by `testId(${randomCaseIdAPI}-icon-more)`
When I click on element located by `testId(profile)`
When I wait until element located by `testId(${surgeonFullName}case-details-overview)` appears

When I find ((<=)) `1` elements by `caseSensitiveText(Show more)` and for each element do
|step                                         |
|When I click on element located by `xpath(.)`|

scenarios.title: check left panel data

steps: When I change context to element located by `testId(<locator>)`
When I save text of context element to scenario variable `elementText`

steps.value: When I change context to element located by `testId(((jnj-navigation-side-bar-title)))`
When I save text of context element to ((scenario)) variable `elementText`
Then `${elementText}` is ((equal to)) `((${randomCasePatientFNameAPI}, ${randomCasePatientLNameAPI}))`

scenarios.title: convert backend data

steps:
When the condition `#{eval("${<condVarName>}"=="<condVarValue>")}` is true I do
|step                                                                        |
|Given I initialize story variable `<resVarName>` with value `<resVarValue1>`|

When the condition `#{eval("${<condVarName>}"!="<condVarValue>")}` is true I do
{headerSeparator=!,valueSeparator=!}
!step                                                                        !
!Given I initialize story variable `<resVarName>` with value `<resVarValue2>`!

values: #{formatDateTo(${randomCaseSurgeryDateAPI}, yyyy-MM-dd, MMM dd\, yyyy)} | #{toLowerCase(#{formatDateTo(2000-01-01 ${randomCaseSurgeryTimeAPI}, yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss, HH:mma)})} EST | ${randomCaseSurgeryDurationAPI}

parameters.resVarValue2: #{formatDateTo(${randomCaseSurgeryDateAPI}, yyyy-MM-dd, MMM dd\, yyyy)} | #{toLowerCase(#{formatDateTo(2000-01-01 ${randomCaseSurgeryTimeAPI}, yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss, HH:mma)})} EST | ${randomCaseSurgeryDurationAPI}

steps.value:
When the condition `#{eval("${((randomCaseSurgeryDateDB))}"=="((null))")}` is true I do
|step                                                                        |
|Given I initialize story variable `((procedureDate))` with value `((Surgery date pending))`|
steps.failure: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Invalid condition `#{eval("${randomCaseSurgeryDateDB}"=="null")}`, supported conditions are: 'true', 'on', 'y', 't', 'yes', '1', 'false', 'off', 'n', 'f', 'no' or '0' (case insensitive)

steps.value:
When the condition `#{eval("${((randomCaseSurgeryDateDB))}"!="((null))")}` is true I do
{headerSeparator=!,valueSeparator=!}
!step                                                                        !
!Given I initialize story variable `((procedureDate))` with value `((#{formatDateTo(${randomCaseSurgeryDateAPI}, yyyy-MM-dd, MMM dd\, yyyy)} | #{toLowerCase(#{formatDateTo(2000-01-01 ${randomCaseSurgeryTimeAPI}, yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss, HH:mma)})} EST | ${randomCaseSurgeryDurationAPI}))`!

When the condition `#{eval("${((randomCasePatientACDB))}"=="(())")}` is true I do
